name: Specimen (Aphix.Dev, CosmicSnowman)
description:
You are in a laboratory testing a variety of specimens. At any time, any of these specimens can go out of control. Control them using the buttons on the panel. One false move, and you lose a life. Let the specimen go out of control for too long, you lose a life. Don't worry, you only need to survive for 3 minutes!

Made by Jake (CosmicSnowman) and Jordan (Aphix) for GMTK 2020 Game Jam
